# Install the Android SDK and Eclipse http://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html
# Checkout the application with svn checkout http://g2android.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ g2android-read-only
# In Eclipse, Import the existing project in the workspace by selecting g2android-read-only/g2android
# In Eclipse, select Project | Clean... to remove the strange error about the missing 'gen' directory
# With Context menu on the project, select Run As | Android application to launch it
